At this point, don't even bother.  You'll start the game as a level 0.  Anything under level 6 gets booted from multiplayer servers by the players.  That's the type of community you can expect with this game, and isn't it the community that is a draw for co-op multiplayer?

Even if everything else feels smooth with the gameplay (weapon strength vs monsters, tactical positioning, and use of medkits), it becomes meaningless when you have to grind harder than WoW to be taken seriously by other players.  Play it constantly 60+ hours a week or don't bother.

Ele é basicamente um jogo de zumbi com hordas.
Com vários servidores disponiveis, e alguns modos não oficiais muito divertidos como o gun game ( meu favorito )
Não há tantos servidores brasileiros, mas o que tem são bons e seu ping vai ficar baixissimo.

DICA: Compre com promoção, mesmo o jogo sendo legal não vale a pena dar 25 reais nele! 

OBS: Eu só fui começar a gostar do jogo quando eu conheci os servidores brasileiros, esse foi o meu primeiro jogo que comprei na steam e o que eu menos joguei por conta dos lags que tinham em servidores gringos ( ping 200 + ), isso fazia com que eu não jogasse ele por que para mim só é divertido o multilpayer dele.

This is a great game but if you're not into killing hoards and hoards of enemies, you'll probably grow bored quickly. There is a leveling system which provides incentive to keep playing but once you reach max level, which isn't hard to do, the game becomes painfully easy unless you go to the two highest difficulties which usually only has a handful of servers running because most people don't get to the highest levels. Teamwork is necessary to win this game, if you don't communicate or decide to go off on your own, you will die and your team will lose. So if you can't work well with others, this game won't be any fun.

That being said, if you a looking for a good co-op shooter which requires planning out team roles, hold out points, and a
genuinely challenging boss at the end of every match, this is pretty good game to get.

Fun game but the glitches, bugs, and crashes ruin it for me. I have played this game awhile now and it is more aggrivating to make my way through the stages and die by the boss because he spawns right in front of me, Or when his rocket goes through a wall to kill me. When looking at the servers, it is constantly updating and moving. This is an annoyance, because when you try to join the one you want it will update and move, causing you to click the wrong server. You then have to wait for the level to load while you try and quit and join the one you want hoping it isn't full. Another problem is the admins. They boot people for starting off with the wrong class constantly. I seen people get booted just because the accidently chose firebug.It happened to me because i was a demo last game and started off demo in my new game. I got booted. I have also joined a game where it shows im a level 0, which i clearly wasn't. This resulted in yet another kick.The crashes happen occasionally. And it pisses me off because of all the time i spent going through the levels, only to be fucked in the end. 
Some of the positives are the gore, the teamwork, and fun you have in each round. It is repetitive, but getting the achievement for completing it on it's hardest setting can be very satisfying.

Killing Floor командная игра, в которой один “отец” не способен тащить на себе всю команду. Одиночка не сможет пройти дальше, чем на Легкую сложность, иначе его просто сомнут зомби. Если вам не интересна работа в команде, а хочется просто побегать одному и весело пострелять по движущимся мишеням в декорациях зомби-апокалипсиса, то проходите мимо этой игры. Не стоит нервировать как самого себя, так и других игроков, пытаясь изображать из себя Рэмбо.

Killing floor is a great and cheap first Person Shooter Survival Horror Game. It provides you with much more gameplay than the $15 asked. There are different classes to choose from that all play differently and keep the game fun for hours to come. The eerie atmosphere adds to the excitement as the hordes grow wave after wave until the Patriach makes everyone scramble together.
Zombies, guns, cheap, fun. Wait for a sale, buy it with friends, come back every now and then for cheap thrills!
love this game

Seré breve con esta reseña, porque al buen entendedor, pocas palabras; este juego vale la pena hasta el último peso que le inviertas; y si tienes amigos, no se porque no lo has comprado.

Es un shooter con elementos únicos, una extensa variedad de armas, con algunos agregados, los mapas son muy distintos entre sí y el juego te va a oblugar a explorarlos y en otros casos a memorizarlos. 

Tienen un nivel de adicción exagerado, tiene la posibilidad de jugar en solitario y sirve para aumentar tu nivel, pero la experiencia se vuelve única en equipo (con amigos). Cabe aclarar que el juego es difícil, por lo que te recomiendo empezar en dificultad novato.

Advertencia: No tiene modo historia y ya no tiene tantos servidores como otros juegos y quizá tengas dificultades para jugar con otras personas, pero en internet hay algunos tutoriales que te pueden servir.

Recomendado para los amantes de los shooters.
Bastante bueno, lo recomiendo por su gran variedad de armas, mapas, personajes, clases y con el tiempo se vuelve mas adictivo

This game is so much fun. Even though the objective is always the same (survival). The addition of the killing floor Objective Mode just added to the charm of the game, giving us tasks and objectives to complete as per the modes description. What i like about the game is it never gets boring, the DLC is great, and the demands on the PC are low which is useful to those with lower end PC's who struggle to keep up with modern games, i honestly think this is one of the best FPS games to date, and for those of you don't like peer to peer competitive, then this is the game for you! All the fun of FPS, without the competitive nature of the game, just pure Co-Op, team orientated survival. So many achievements to get, lots of levels to be played, and so much fun to be had! - And you can play solo too.

I would recommend this game to all players whether you are competitive or not!

I have logged so many hours into this game it is ridiculous. Every person I have recommended this game likes it.

Killing Floor is sorta like a horde game where you and your teammates kill waves of dead specimens getting money. At the end of each wave a shop opens and you get to purchase weapons, stock on ammo grenades kevlar for the next round.
It's not like left 4 dead where you follow a trail to get from point A to B, but in Killing Floor the whole map is opened to explore.

Pros: hilarious English voice accents, many weapons which feel balanced and realistic with recoil, a nice class/perk leveling up system, great many various maps, slow motion kills(although some people dont like it), and an overall satisfaction to recking all the specimens down and blowing them limbs off

Cons: 
dated graphics, 
unlike left 4 dead where u have to get to the chopper, there is no real objective other than survive the final wave,
no character differentiation what so ever, all are clones with same voice acting which sucks cuz you get to pick a character and class to play as,
some achievements are damn near impossible to get since the game can get really hard at suicidal and hell on earth difficulties.

I highly recommend this game. The gaming community is still much alive so you should be able to find plenty of servers to join the fun.
gives you an perfect sight into the female life. Either a stalker who slowly kills you, or a screaming wife in her sleeping dress. Loved it xD
